basic_information.scholarship_name: Mildred Lorene Davis Scholarship for Dance

description: This scholarship was established in 2017 by Debra Sue Pense in honor of her mother, the late Mildred Lorene Davis. Mildred was hard-working, industrious and active her entire life and enjoyed many recreational activities including dance. Eligibility Dance major Cumulative GPA 2.5+ Sophomore, junior or senior Enrolled full time (12+ hours) Requirements 1 1/2 to 2 page statement about the role of dance in a healthy and active lifestyle Personal artist statement (250 words) Official transcript

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: SIS_Major_2 is Dance   or SIS_Major_2 is Dance Education   or SIS_Major is Dance   or SIS_Major is Dance Education   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Dance   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Dance Education   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Dance   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Dance Education
